DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether woman postpartum major depressive disorder ( MDD ) experience significant decrease depressive symptom baseline eight-week treatment intervention escitalopram ( Lexapro ) . Also , determine whether woman postpartum MDD experience significant decrease anxiety symptom .
DOC.criteria: Women age 18 45 year old Subjects must meet criterion major depressive episode symptom develop within three month live childbirth Subjects must present within six month childbirth MADRS score > 15 BAI score > 10 Subjects able treated outpatient basis Subjects able provide write informed consent Subjects take psychotropic medication , include antidepressant antianxiety medication , within past two week ( exception nonbenzodiazepine medication use sleep , include trazodone , zolpidem , eszopiclone , etc ) Suicidal ideation active plan intent , determine investigator Presence psychotic symptom homicidal ideation History mania hypomania Pregnant breastfeeding Presence chronic depression dysthymia , chronic treatment resistant anxiety disorder , determine investigator Active alcohol/substance abuse currently within past year Abnormal TSH , severe anemia , uncontrolled hypertension
